ij.plugin
Class FITS_Reader

java.lang.Object
  ij.ImagePlus
      ij.plugin.FITS_Reader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Measurements, PlugIn, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.lang.Cloneable
public class FITS_Reader
extends ImagePlus
implements PlugIn

Opens and displays FITS images. The FITS format is described at "ftp://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/fits".
